00020         WorldState* loadScenario5()
00021         {
00022                 WorldState* state = new WorldState();
00023 
00024                 GameObject* background = new GameObject();
00025                 background->usesPhysics = false;
00026                 background->setSprite("Backgrounds\\background");
00027                 state->addBackgroundObject(background);
00028 
00029                 Ship* player = new Ship();
00030                 player->setSprite("Hulls\\Sample Hull");
00031                 player->isPlayer = true;
00032                 player->projectileBrain = &makeBoringBrain;
00033                 state->insertObject(player,point(100,300));
00034 
00035                 Ship* opponent = new Ship();
00036                 opponent->displayHeading.set_degrees(180);
00037                 opponent->setSprite("Hulls\\Fighter1");
00038                 
00039                 
00040 
00041                 opponent->projectileBrain = &makeHomingBrain;
00042                 opponent->brain
00043                         ->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00044                                 ->addChild(new BoolCondition<GameObject>(&GameObject::projectileNearby,true))
00045                                 ->addChild((new CountLimitNode(5,false))->addChild((new SequentialNode())
00046                                                 ->addChild(new DestroyAllNearbyProjectiles())
00047                                                 ->addChild(new Cooldown(2000)))));
00048 
00049                 state->insertObject(opponent,point(100,50));
00050                 return state;
00051         }
